import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Updates the metadata of a class's gradebook."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/org/{orgid}/classes/{classid}/gradebooks/{gradebook_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the metadata of a specific gradebook for a given class.  This operation requires authentication.

**Permissions:** Teacher, Admin, Superadmin
**Events:** `CLASS.GRADEBOOK_META_UPDATE` (success, error)
**Request Body:** `UpdateGradebookMetaBody`
**Response 200:** `GradebookMetaRes`
**Response 401:** `InvalidToken`
**Response 404:** `ResourceNotFound`

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgid","in":"path","description":"The ID of the organization.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"classid","in":"path","description":"The ID of the class.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"gradebook_id","in":"path","description":"The ID of the gradebook.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","description":"Authentication token.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Details of the gradebook metadata updates.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string"},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{}}},"title":"UpdateGradebookMetaBody"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response containing updated gradebook metadata.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"pk":{"type":"string"},"sk":{"type":"string"},"account":{"type":"string"},"orgid":{"type":"string"},"classid":{"type":"string"},"gradebook_id":{"type":"string"},"title":{"type":"string"},"category":{"type":"string"},"created_by":{"type":"string"},"created":{"type":"number"},"modified":{"type":"number"},"version":{"type":"number"},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{}}},"title":"GradebookMetaRes"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"statusCode":{"type":"string","enum":["401"]},"message":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string","enum":["BadCredentials"]}},"title":"InvalidToken"}}}},"404":{"description":"Gradebook or class not found.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"statusCode":{"type":"string","enum":["404"]},"message":{"type":"string","enum":["Entity not found in DynamoDB"]}},"title":"ResourceNotFound"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
